message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 3-3-5, translated into en
data: A data quality review toolkit has been developed by WHO to provide a multi-pronged approach that ensures a comprehensive and holistic review of the quality of health facility data. WHO has also developed a field manual to guide national NTD programmes in using tools to improve data quality and information, through coverage evaluation surveys, data quality assessments and a supervisors’ coverage tool (https://apps.who.int/iris/bitstream/handle/10665/329376/9789241516464-eng.pdf).
